title: Setbacks for Santa Cruz County fire districts as only one of three bond measures passes
summary: The article discusses the challenges faced by fire districts in Santa Cruz County, California, following the outcome of three bond measures, of which only one passed. It does not report on a specific fire incident or any accidental fires affecting homes or buildings. Instead, it focuses on the implications of the bond measures for fire services in the area. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for describing a fire incident.
